evidence.text: Defendants' April 2, 2025 terminations of Plaintiffs’ previously approved grants was unlawful and Defendants are enjoined from implementing those terminations as to grants awarded to either Plaintiffs Oregon Council for the Humanities d/b/a Oregon Humanities or the Federation of State Humanities Councils, including all member Councils of the Federation

add_extracted.value: Defendants are enjoined from implementing the April 2, 2025 terminations of Plaintiffs' previously approved grants

evidence.text: Defendants shall not further terminate, suspend, or cancel Plaintiffs’ grants approved as of April 2, 2025, absent cause specified in 20 U.S.C. § 956(f)(7) or further Order of the Court

add_extracted.value: Defendants shall not further terminate, suspend, or cancel Plaintiffs' grants approved as of April 2, 2025, absent cause specified in 20 U.S.C. § 956(f)(7)

evidence.text: Defendants shall not obligate, loan, encumber, disburse, or otherwise dispose of the funds committed to Plaintiffs, including the member Councils of the Federation, through grants approved as of April 2, 2025, except as to Plaintiffs

add_extracted.value: Defendants shall not obligate, loan, encumber, disburse, or otherwise dispose of funds committed to Plaintiffs through grants approved as of April 2, 2025
until further order of the Court: Preliminary Injunction and Stay
